title: Once Upon a Time
description: Attacked, mutilated and left for dead, Catherine Chandler is rescued by the mysterious man-beast called Vincent.

title: Terrible Savior
description: Witness descriptions of a vigilante lead Catherine to fear Vincent may be a killer.

title: Siege
description: Vincent helps the residents of an apartment building defend their homes against thugs who want them out so the land can be re-developed.

title: No Way Down
description: Injured in an explosion, Vincent is captured by a vicious street gang.

title: Masques
description: Free to walk the streets openly on Halloween, Vincent becomes the guardian of an Irish peace activist who's been targeted for assassination.

title: The Beast Within
description: Vincent must choose loyalties when a childhood friend becomes a mob enforcer.

title: Nor Iron Bars a Cage
description: Accidentally caught on film, Vincent become the target of a scientist desperate to learn the truth about him.

title: Song of Orpheus
description: When Father ventures to the Above World for the first time in decades, he is arrested for murder. Vincent and Catherine must delve into Father's mysterious past to uncover the truth.

title: Dark Spirit
description: Investigating a mysterious death makes Catherine the target of a voodoo cult.

title: A Children's Story
description: Catherine learns that the city's model foster home for children is hiding a dark secret.

title: An Impossible Silence
description: When she witnesses a shooting, a deaf girl must decide whether to abandon the sanctuary of the City Below to free an innocent man.

title: Shades of Grey
description: Mouse makes his first appearance - and is quickly shunned by the Family of tunnel folk for thievery. But shortly after Mouse's month-long period of silence begins, Father and Vincent get trapped under ground, Father is seriously hurt, and no one can figure how to get them out. Up Top, Catherine has dealings with Elliot Berch again - and he manages to worm his way back into her life. Everyone learns that things aren't quite as Black & White as they might like them to be.

title: China Moon
description: Vincent and Catherine help a Chinatown beauty avoid an arranged marriage by escaping underground.

title: The Alchemist
description: Catherine has reason to believe that a new drug on the streets is being supplied by someone from Vincent's world.

title: Temptation
description: A beautiful attorney seduces Catherine's boss, Joe Maxwell, creating a serious conflict of interest.

title: Promises of Someday
description: Catherine is disturbed when she begins to suspect the new attorney in her office is a fraud... and more disturbed when she finds him looking for the entrance to Vincent's world.

title: Down to a Sunless Sea
description: Catherine fails to heed Vincent's warnings about her dangerous former law-school beau.

title: Fever
description: After Mouse discovers a treasure-filled ship buried beneath the city, Vincent's world is filled with greed and strife.

title: Everything Is Everything
description: A Gypsy boy clears his father's name and regains the love and trust of his grandparents with Vincent and Catherine's help.

title: To Reign in Hell
description: Vincent prepares for a battle to the death after Catherine is kidnapped by a giant warrior.

title: Ozymandias
description: Vincent's world Below is threatened by a massive tower being built by Elliot Burch, a former suitor of Catherine's. She agrees to marry Burch on the condition that he halt construction.

title: A Happy Life
description: Catherine and Vincent are forced to question if they could ever be truly happy together.

title: Chamber Music
description: While walking in the world Above, Vincent (Ron Perlman) recognizes Rolly,a teenage musical prodigy and ex-tunnel dweller who is now a junkie.

title: Remember Love
description: In a moment of profound despair, Vincent undergoes his own "It's A Wonderful Life" experience and sees what would have happened if he had died as a baby.

title: Ashes, Ashes
description: A Russian sailor escapes to the tunnels only to bring a plague upon the people in the Underworld. It is up to Catherine, Vincent, Father, and everybody to help save their world.

title: Dead of Winter
description: When the tunnel world is having an annual event, Paracelcus makes plans to crash the event and do something. When all of the participants arrive, including some friends from the surface, things seem to be OK until Narcisa shows up. It seems she had encountered Paracelcus earlier who had in his possession someone's head who then tried to kill her. They assume Paracelcus is there in disguise. Catherine and Vincent deduce it must be someone from the surface but there are only three whom he knew before he was banished so they try to figure out who could it be.

title: God Bless the Child
description: With Catherine's help, a pregnant teenage hooker is welcomed into the tunnels. Complications arise when she falls in love with Vincent.

title: Sticks and Stones
description: A deaf girl, who used to live below, falls in with a street gang that threatens to put an end to her first serious love affair.

title: A Fair and Perfect Knight
description: Catherine befriends a boy from the world below who leaves the tunnels to go college.

title: Labyrinths
description: A young man gets lost in the tunnel world and he is found by the inhabitants. They're uncertain if they should let him go because they're not sure if he can be trusted to keep their secret. But when a search party comes looking for him, they decide to try to convince him to keep their world a secret.

title: Brothers
description: Vincent's "brother" Devin returns with Charles, a hideously deformed man seeking sanctuary.

title: A Gentle Rain
description: Kanin, a resident of the Underworld, goes into a store on the surface and is recognized by a woman as the man who killed her son, years ago. She then goes to the police and D.A. demanding that they bring him in. Catherine speaks to them and Kanin doesn't want to leave his family. But Vincent tells him that he should take responsibility for his actions.

title: The Outsiders
description: When some homeless people enter the tunnel world, father decides to welcome them but Vincent says they should be wary. And it seems he was right cause it seems they're ravenous.

title: Orphans
description: After her father dies, Catherine thinks about living the rest of her life in the world below.

title: Snow
description: The man who killed Catherine and took her baby sends an assassin to get Vincent. He manages to find the underground world and goes looking for him. Vincent upon learning of his presence tries to lead him away from the others.

title: In the Forests of the Night
The Reckoning
description: A woman whom Father knows returns to the city. She asks him to join her and he considers it. At the same time Diana is working on a murder. And it turns that the victim is someone Father knows.
